parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **DOMAIN**.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The key-value pair of a tag.

parameters.name: TagOwnerBid
parameters.description: The business ID of the tag owner.

parameters.name: TagOwnerUid
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the tag belongs.
